title: Topic 001 Question 043
body: A company has an on-premises application that generates a large amount of time-sensitive data that is backed up to Amazon S3. The application has grown and there are user complaints about internet bandwidth limitations. A solutions architect needs to design a long-term solution that allows for both timely backups to Amazon S3 and with minimal impact on internet connectivity for internal users.
options: Establish AWS VPN connections and proxy all traffic through a VPC gateway endpoint.
Establish a new AWS Direct Connect connection and direct backup traffic through this new connection.
Order daily AWS Snowball devices. Load the data onto the Snowball devices and return the devices to AWS each day.
Submit a support ticket through the AWS Management Console. Request the removal of S3 service limits from the account.
